name: Swarm Clicker
description:
The game was originally made for smartphones, clicking is promoted by the first part of the game and then goes to warp speed, the game can be 100% finished in 6 hours and this is the first game I have ever made.

Advance units and upgrades to produce a swarm on an ever larger scale.

Collect progress points to unlock new upgrades.

 - up to +1600 objects on the screen

 - 900 units levels

 - special skills refreshing the game

 - over 100 upgrades levels

 - 13 (+ 5 base) swarm special effects that can be combined

 - 46 achievements to unlock (in-game only)

Support Polish and English language.
